chapters.title: Chapter 5: A Tale of Blood
chapters.info: Elza Penfell, p. 98—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is one of the Aes Sedai now sworn Rand; she assisted in his kidnapping. She is now one of Cadsuane's companions. She has brown eyes and would be pretty except for the ageless look. She is pleasant for an Aes Sedai, and an almost fanatical devotion to Rand. She is secretly of the Black Ajah, but almost no one knows this. Her personal mission is to keep the Dragon Reborn alive until the Last Battle—if he is dead, how will the Great Lord of the Dark defeat him?
